channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 09/19/2024 # New Features and Performance Optimization # Saved both “Final Summary” and “Real-time Summary” within meetings to retain all necessary information. Added date grouping in the meeting list for easier differentiation of meeting dates. Adjusted the structure and presentation of action items. Bugfix # Fixed the issue where the extension failed to correctly capture the meeting title. 09/12/2024 # New Features and Performance Optimization # Introduced Beta features for “Speaker ID” and “Re-run Summary” to split in-person meetings by speaker and regenerate summaries, available for paid users only.
